We realised, its not about catching glimpses of the movie while talking to your friends or keeping it as a background noise. It's about being a part of the movie and finding yourself horse-riding in a battle. It’s about feeling the thrill of hiding from an alien invasion and about smiling on a lovers’ paradise, right from your couch.To bring you this experience, anytime anywhere, we made products that let you immerse in the world of storytelling. Be it tuning into a season that you anxiously waited for, or a favorite movie that’s ready to consume you again. Dive into a theatre-like experience that lets you hear every laugh, every whisper, every dialogue as it was meant to be and binge-watch like never before.
